key_files.tools.py: All agent tools including memory, GitHub API, testing

required_practices: Use parameterized queries for SQL (no string concatenation)
Use context managers for file operations
Include docstrings for all public functions
Write unit tests for all new features

learnings.description: Parallel agent consultation pattern implemented in Phase 1
learnings.solution: Root agent consults security, quality, and test agents simultaneously, then aggregates reports

learnings.description: Sequential workflow pattern with automated rollback
learnings.solution: RefactoringPipeline: analyze → backup → refactor → test → commit/rollback

learnings.description: Iterative debugging with retry loop (max 5 attempts)
learnings.solution: IterativeDebugger runs tests, analyzes errors, searches solutions, applies fixes iteratively

learnings.description: Implemented atomic write protection for JSON corruption
learnings.solution: Use temp file + os.replace() pattern to prevent corruption during interruption

security: Always use prepared statements for database queries
Never hardcode API keys or secrets
code_quality: Use type hints for function parameters
testing: Test edge cases and error conditions
